title: This account has been permanently suspended. Please check the email address associated with your Lea
body: This account has been permanently suspended. i dont know what happen with my account i just use VPN play this game cuz im in china plz riot unlock my account

replies.body:
For an account suspension inquiry, you'll need to reach out to our specialists by [submitting a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We're pretty backed up with tickets lately, so it may be a few days before you hear back from a team member about this, but I wanted to give you a heads up.

Let me know if you have any questions.
